    • getMaxPoint

      public int getMaxPoint()
      Getter of the max point that a player can reach
      返回:
      : integer of max point that a player can reach

    • getMaxPlayerPoint

      public int getMaxPlayerPoint()
      Getter of the point that turns the game last round
      返回:
      : integer of the point that turns the game last round

    • getPlayerPoints

      public Map<Player,Integer> getPlayerPoints()
      Getter of the map with player and his point
      返回:
      : Map with the key of player and the value as the respective point during the game

    • setPlayerPoints

      public void setPlayerPoints(Map<Player,Integer> playerPoints)
      Setter of the map with player and his point
      参数:
      playerPoints - : Map with the key of player and the value as the respective point during the game that would be set

    • updatePoint

      public void updatePoint(Player p)
      Update of the player map with the respective point this Method will avoid that the player point would be higher that the max point reachable
      参数:
      p - : player that may have a new point that would be updated in the map

    • findMaxPoint

      public int findMaxPoint()
      Getter of max point from the players in game
      返回:
      : Integer of the max point of the players

    • findMaxPointPlayers

      public List<Player> findMaxPointPlayers()
      Getter of the players who has the greater point in the game
      返回:
      : List of the max point players

    • CountTarget

      public int CountTarget(Player p, ArrayList<TargetCard> targetCards)
      This method counts the number of target points for a given player. It checks the player's own target as well as a list of TargetCard objects to determine how many of them have points greater than zero.
      参数:
      p - The player whose targets are being evaluated.
      targetCards - An ArrayList of TargetCard objects to be checked.
      返回:
      The number of targets that have points greater than zero.
